title: Simplify template structure - cut ~40 files
description:
## Motivation

The template has grown to ~55 files, which is too complex. Coding agents tend to over-engineer, and this template is a prime example. The goal should be: an agent reads INIT.md + a few snippets and can set up any project. Everything else adds cognitive load without proportional value.

## What to Cut

| Directory | Reason to cut |
|-----------|---------------|
| `examples/` (3 dirs) | Duplicates snippets. Agents can assemble from snippets directly. |
| `patterns/` (5 files) | Teaches agents how to write instructions - they already know this. |
| `gsd-planning/` (8 files) | GSD itself creates these via /gsd:new-project. Redundant with the tool. |
| `snippets/claude-code/settings/` (3 files) | Minimal value. Agents figure out settings.json on their own. |
| `snippets/git-commands/` (3 files) | Redundant with claude-code/commands/. Keep one, not both. |

## Proposed Pruned Structure (~15 files)

```
template/
├── AGENTS.md                    # Meta documentation (update to reflect simpler structure)
├── INIT.md                      # Main guide (simplify to match)
├── RESEARCH.md                  # Keep - useful context
├── questions/
│   └── init-questions.md        # Keep - the question flow
└── snippets/
    ├── claude-md/               # Keep all 5 variants
    │   ├── minimal.md
    │   ├── beads.md
    │   ├── gsd.md
    │   ├── research.md
    │   └── automate.md
    ├── agents-md/
    │   └── full.md              # Keep
    ├── ai-directory/            # Keep all
    │   ├── architecture.md
    │   ├── conventions.md
    │   ├── research/
    │   │   ├── questions.md
    │   │   ├── findings.md
    │   │   └── sources.md
    │   └── automation/
    │       ├── schedule.md
    │       ├── triggers.md
    │       └── outputs.md
    └── claude-code/
        ├── commands/            # Keep all 6
        │   ├── commit.md
        │   ├── pr.md
        │   ├── release.md
        │   ├── status.md
        │   ├── wip.md
        │   └── sync.md
        ├── hooks.md             # Keep
        └── skills/
            └── smart-commit/    # Keep - actually useful
                ├── SKILL.md
                └── .claude-pr-policy.json
```

## Implementation Steps

1. Delete directories: examples/, snippets/patterns/, snippets/gsd-planning/, snippets/claude-code/settings/, snippets/git-commands/
2. Update AGENTS.md to reflect simpler structure
3. Update INIT.md - remove references to deleted content, simplify where possible
4. Verify remaining snippets still work with INIT.md flow
5. Commit with message explaining the simplification rationale

## Key Principle

If GSD or beads or the agent itself creates something, don't template it. Only template what the agent genuinely needs to copy.
